item.description:
A free noon concert with professional pianist/NHCer Alexis, soprano Nicole Rodriguez, and many other musicians (clarinet, horn, violin). Songs from Cole Porter, and classical songs from Vaughan Williams, Ives, and Schubert.

Approximately 1 hour long (a little less actually). If you need to come late or leave early, just enter/exit between songs.

In the lecture hall of the Sterling Library at Yale University. You cannot eat food while in the Library.

Performers: Alexis, & Mark Bailey: piano; Nicole Rodriguez, soprano; Stephen Mulligan & Diane Napert: violin; Eva Heater: horn; Jenny Ferrar: clarinet

POST PARTY: There might be a chance of grabbing a bite or drink after.

HOST: Alexis, cell 203-747-9203 (texting ok too). However she will be unreachable for a while before the concert, as she'll be busy warming-up for it. You can also call Jason, 203-901-4957 (texting ok too).

You can hear Alexis playing some Mozart at her site:
www.myspace.com/alexiszingalepianist

DIRECTIONS: For directions, click here

PARKING: Metered street parking or local parking garages.
item.name: Wed. 12/3 - Alexis + singer (& more) in free noon concert at Yale
